body.p: I have had the honor of holding a Commission, as Commissioner of the State of Kentucky, for the State of California, for the last four years. That Commission expires on the 19th of June next, and I now ask from your Excellency another Commission Holding Commissions from all the states of Territories, I am particularly solicitous about that of my native state, Kentucky.
Hoping your Excellency may find it agreeable to renew my commission, I have the honor to be

Very Respectfully
Your Obt Sevt.
C J Brenham

To his Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Frankfort
Ky.

California
Comr. of Deeds
C. J. Brenham
San Fransisco
Issd May 7. 1861
